bs-permissionmanager-desc: Administration interface for editing user rights
bs-permissionmanager-error-lockout:
At least one group must own the right "$1".
Changes couldn't be saved.
log-description-bs-permission-manager: This is a log of changes in the group permissions.
logentry-bs-permission-manager-modify: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has}} changed the permissions of the group $4
bs-permissionmanager-hint: This role includes {{PLURAL:$2|the following permission: $1| following permissions: $1}}
bs-permissionmanager-write-config-file-e: Not able to create or write $1
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-depende:
This role requires {{PLURAL:$2|the following permission|following permissions}}:
$1
bs-permissionmanager-preset-private-help:
* Only logged-in users can '''view and edit''' the content
* Only users in the group "sysop" can perform '''administrative actions'''
bs-permissionmanager-preset-protected-he:
* Everyone can '''view''' the content - including anonymous users
* Only logged-in users can '''edit''' the content
* Only users in the group "sysop" can perform '''administrative actions'''
bs-permissionmanager-preset-public-help:
* Everyone can '''view and edit''' the content - including anonymous users
* Only users in the group "sysop" can perform '''administrative actions'''
bs-permissionmanager-switch-preset-confi: Switching the preset will be applied immediately to all users in the wiki. Are you sure you want to continue?
bs-permissionmanager-preset-save-error: Configuration cannot be saved! Changes are not applied!
bs-permissionmanager-pref-max-backups-he: Number of backups for last changes to the permission manager (Special:PermissionManager).
bs-permissionmanager-groupmanager-invali: The group name contains {{PLURAL:$1|an invalid character|invalid characters}}: $2
The group name cannot be longer than 255 characters.
The group name needs to have at least one character.
bs-permissionmanager-group-remove-confir: Deleting the group "$1" will immediately and irreversibly remove all users from this group, and therefore revoke all permissions granted to this group. Are you sure you want to continue?
bs-permissionmanager-advanced-switch-con: There are unsaved changes. If you switch the mode, those changes will be lost!
bs-permission-manager-simple-matrix-glob: Grant roles for every namespace on wiki, unless explicitly blocked
bs-permissionmanager-simple-setonwiki-su: Select roles to grant to this group exclusively in selected namespace (blocking all other groups)
bs-permissionmanager-simple-blocked-sub: Select it to add this group to list of groups that are granted this role
